title: Silent Chill Music Pack
description: Silent Chill music pack inspired by old school horror games like Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Obscure, Alone in the Dark etc. This perfect for your video game.
longDescription:
YouTube Demo


This epic pack delivers a vast soundscape palette with 50 original, royalty-free ambient tracks. Craft the perfect atmosphere for any environment, from serene meadows to haunting ruins. Over 1 hour of music you can use to express the story and atmosphere of your game.
